text: Paul [strongs id="g3972" /], a servant [strongs id="g1401" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /], and [strongs id="g1161" /] an apostle [strongs id="g652" /] of Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /], according to [strongs id="g2596" /] the faith [strongs id="g4102" /] of God’s [strongs id="g2316" /] elect [strongs id="g1588" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] the acknowledging [strongs id="g1922" /] of the truth [strongs id="g225" /] which [strongs id="g3588" /] is after [strongs id="g2596" /] godliness [strongs id="g2150" /];

But [strongs id="g1161" /] hath [strongs id="g5319" /] in due [strongs id="g2398" /] times [strongs id="g2540" /] manifested [strongs id="g5319" tvm="AorActInd" /] his [strongs id="g846" /] word [strongs id="g3056" /] through [strongs id="g1722" /] preaching [strongs id="g2782" /], which [strongs id="g3739" /] is committed [strongs id="g4100" tvm="AorPasInd" /] unto me [strongs id="g1473" /] according to [strongs id="g2596" /] the commandment [strongs id="g2003" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] Saviour [strongs id="g4990" /];

To Titus [strongs id="g5103" /], [mine] own [strongs id="g1103" /] son [strongs id="g5043" /] after [strongs id="g2596" /] the common [strongs id="g2839" /] faith [strongs id="g4102" /]: Grace [strongs id="g5485" /], mercy [strongs id="g1656" /], [and] peace [strongs id="g1515" /], from [strongs id="g575" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /] the Father [strongs id="g3962" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] the Lord [strongs id="g2962" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] Saviour [strongs id="g4990" /].

For this [strongs id="g5127" /] cause [strongs id="g5484" /] left I [strongs id="g2641" tvm="Aor2ActInd" /] thee [strongs id="g4571" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] Crete [strongs id="g2914" /], that [strongs id="g2443" /] thou shouldest set in order [strongs id="g1930" tvm="AorMidSubj" /] the things that are wanting [strongs id="g3007" tvm="PresActPtc" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] ordain [strongs id="g2525" tvm="AorActSubj" /] elders [strongs id="g4245" /] in every [strongs id="g2596" /] city [strongs id="g4172" /], as [strongs id="g5613" /] I [strongs id="g1473" /] had appointed [strongs id="g1299" tvm="AorMidInd" /] thee [strongs id="g4671" /]:

For [strongs id="g1063" /] a bishop [strongs id="g1985" /] must [strongs id="g1163" tvm="PresInd" /] be [strongs id="g1511" tvm="PresInf" /] blameless [strongs id="g410" /], as [strongs id="g5613" /] the steward [strongs id="g3623" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /]; not [strongs id="g3361" /] selfwilled [strongs id="g829" /], not [strongs id="g3361" /] soon angry [strongs id="g3711" /], not [strongs id="g3361" /] given to wine [strongs id="g3943" /], no [strongs id="g3361" /] striker [strongs id="g4131" /], not [strongs id="g3361" /] given to filthy lucre [strongs id="g146" /];

But [strongs id="g235" /] a lover of hospitality [strongs id="g5382" /], a lover of good men [strongs id="g5358" /], sober [strongs id="g4998" /], just [strongs id="g1342" /], holy [strongs id="g3741" /], temperate [strongs id="g1468" /];

For [strongs id="g1063" /] there are [strongs id="g1526" tvm="PresInd" /] many [strongs id="g4183" /] unruly [strongs id="g506" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] vain talkers [strongs id="g3151" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] deceivers [strongs id="g5423" /], specially [strongs id="g3122" /] they of [strongs id="g1537" /] the circumcision [strongs id="g4061" /]:

Whose [strongs id="g3739" /] mouths [strongs id="g1993" /] must [strongs id="g1163" tvm="PresInd" /] be stopped [strongs id="g1993" tvm="PresActInf" /], who [strongs id="g3748" /] subvert [strongs id="g396" tvm="PresActInd" /] whole [strongs id="g3650" /] houses [strongs id="g3624" /], teaching [strongs id="g1321" tvm="PresActPtc" /] things which [strongs id="g3739" /] they ought [strongs id="g1163" tvm="PresInd" /] not [strongs id="g3361" /], for [strongs id="g5484" /] filthy [strongs id="g150" /] lucre’s [strongs id="g2771" /] sake [strongs id="g5484" /].

One [strongs id="g5100" /] of [strongs id="g1537" /] themselves [strongs id="g846" /], [even] a prophet [strongs id="g4396" /] of their [strongs id="g846" /] own [strongs id="g2398" /], said [strongs id="g2036" tvm="Aor2ActInd" /], The Cretians [strongs id="g2912" /] [are] alway [strongs id="g104" /] liars [strongs id="g5583" /], evil [strongs id="g2556" /] beasts [strongs id="g2342" /], slow [strongs id="g692" /] bellies [strongs id="g1064" /].

This [strongs id="g3778" /] witness [strongs id="g3141" /] is [strongs id="g2076" tvm="PresInd" /] true [strongs id="g227" /]. Wherefore [strongs id="g1223" /] [strongs id="g3739" /] [strongs id="g156" /] rebuke [strongs id="g1651" tvm="PresActImpr" /] them [strongs id="g846" /] sharply [strongs id="g664" /], that [strongs id="g2443" /] they may be sound [strongs id="g5198" tvm="PresActSubj" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] the faith [strongs id="g4102" /];

Not [strongs id="g3361" /] giving heed [strongs id="g4337" tvm="PresActPtc" /] to Jewish [strongs id="g2451" /] fables [strongs id="g3454" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] commandments [strongs id="g1785" /] of men [strongs id="g444" /], that turn from [strongs id="g654" tvm="PresMidPtc" /] the truth [strongs id="g225" /].

Unto the pure [strongs id="g2513" /] all things [strongs id="g3956" /] [are] pure [strongs id="g3303" /] [strongs id="g2513" /]: but [strongs id="g1161" /] unto them that are defiled [strongs id="g3392" tvm="PerfPasPtc" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] unbelieving [strongs id="g571" /] [is] nothing [strongs id="g3762" /] pure [strongs id="g2513" /]; but [strongs id="g235" /] even [strongs id="g2532" /] their [strongs id="g846" /] mind [strongs id="g3563" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] conscience [strongs id="g4893" /] is defiled [strongs id="g3392" tvm="PerfPasInd" /].

They profess [strongs id="g3670" tvm="PresActInd" /] that they know [strongs id="g1492" tvm="PerfActInf" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /]; but [strongs id="g1161" /] in works [strongs id="g2041" /] they deny [strongs id="g720" tvm="PresMidPasDepInd" /] [him], being [strongs id="g5607" tvm="PresPtc" /] abominable [strongs id="g947" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] disobedient [strongs id="g545" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] unto [strongs id="g4314" /] every [strongs id="g3956" /] good [strongs id="g18" /] work [strongs id="g2041" /] reprobate [strongs id="g96" /].

But [strongs id="g1161" /] speak [strongs id="g2980" tvm="PresActImpr" /] thou [strongs id="g4771" /] the things which [strongs id="g3739" /] become [strongs id="g4241" tvm="PresActInd" /] sound [strongs id="g5198" tvm="PresActPtc" /] doctrine [strongs id="g1319" /]:

That the aged men [strongs id="g4246" /] be [strongs id="g1511" tvm="PresInf" /] sober [strongs id="g3524" /], grave [strongs id="g4586" /], temperate [strongs id="g4998" /], sound [strongs id="g5198" tvm="PresActPtc" /] in faith [strongs id="g4102" /], in charity [strongs id="g26" /], in patience [strongs id="g5281" /].

The aged women [strongs id="g4247" /] likewise [strongs id="g5615" /], that [they be] in [strongs id="g1722" /] behaviour [strongs id="g2688" /] as becometh holiness [strongs id="g2412" /], not [strongs id="g3361" /] false accusers [strongs id="g1228" /], not [strongs id="g3361" /] given [strongs id="g1402" tvm="PerfPasPtc" /] to much [strongs id="g4183" /] wine [strongs id="g3631" /], teachers of good things [strongs id="g2567" /];

That [strongs id="g2443" /] they may teach [strongs id="g4994" /] the young women [strongs id="g3501" /] to be [strongs id="g1511" tvm="PresInf" /] sober [strongs id="g4994" tvm="PresActSubj" /], to love their husbands [strongs id="g5362" /], to love their children [strongs id="g5388" /],

[To be] discreet [strongs id="g4998" /], chaste [strongs id="g53" /], keepers at home [strongs id="g3626" /], good [strongs id="g18" /], obedient [strongs id="g5293" tvm="PresPasPtc" /] to their own [strongs id="g2398" /] husbands [strongs id="g435" /], that [strongs id="g3363" /] the word [strongs id="g3056" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /] be [strongs id="g987" /] not [strongs id="g3363" /] blasphemed [strongs id="g987" tvm="PresPasSubj" /].
Young men [strongs id="g3501" /] likewise [strongs id="g5615" /] exhort [strongs id="g3870" tvm="PresActImpr" /] to be sober minded [strongs id="g4993" tvm="PresActInf" /].

In [strongs id="g4012" /] all things [strongs id="g3956" /] shewing [strongs id="g3930" tvm="PresMidPtc" /] thyself [strongs id="g4572" /] a pattern [strongs id="g5179" /] of good [strongs id="g2570" /] works [strongs id="g2041" /]: in [strongs id="g1722" /] doctrine [strongs id="g1319" /] [shewing] uncorruptness [strongs id="g90" /], gravity [strongs id="g4587" /], sincerity [strongs id="g861" /],

Looking for [strongs id="g4327" tvm="PresMidPasDepPtc" /] that blessed [strongs id="g3107" /] hope [strongs id="g1680" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] the glorious [strongs id="g1391" /] appearing [strongs id="g2015" /] of the great [strongs id="g3173" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] Saviour [strongs id="g4990" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /];

Put [strongs id="g5279" /] them [strongs id="g846" /] in mind [strongs id="g5279" tvm="PresActImpr" /] to be subject [strongs id="g5293" tvm="PresMidInf" /] to principalities [strongs id="g746" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] powers [strongs id="g1849" /], to obey magistrates [strongs id="g3980" tvm="PresActInf" /], to be [strongs id="g1511" tvm="PresInf" /] ready [strongs id="g2092" /] to [strongs id="g4314" /] every [strongs id="g3956" /] good [strongs id="g18" /] work [strongs id="g2041" /],

To speak evil of [strongs id="g987" tvm="PresActInf" /] no man [strongs id="g3367" /], to be [strongs id="g1511" tvm="PresInf" /] no brawlers [strongs id="g269" /], [but] gentle [strongs id="g1933" /], shewing [strongs id="g1731" tvm="PresMidPtc" /] all [strongs id="g3956" /] meekness [strongs id="g4236" /] unto [strongs id="g4314" /] all [strongs id="g3956" /] men [strongs id="g444" /].

But [strongs id="g1161" /] after [strongs id="g3753" /] that the kindness [strongs id="g5544" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] love [strongs id="g5363" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] Saviour [strongs id="g4990" /] toward man [strongs id="g5363" /] appeared [strongs id="g2014" tvm="Aor2PasDepSubj" /],

Which [strongs id="g3739" /] he shed [strongs id="g1632" tvm="AorActInd" /] on [strongs id="g1909" /] us [strongs id="g2248" /] abundantly [strongs id="g4146" /] through [strongs id="g1223" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] Saviour [strongs id="g4990" /];

That [strongs id="g2443" /] being justified by [strongs id="g1344" tvm="AorPasPtc" /] his [strongs id="g1565" /] grace [strongs id="g5485" /], we should be made [strongs id="g1096" tvm="Aor2MidDepSubj" /] heirs [strongs id="g2818" /] according to [strongs id="g2596" /] the hope [strongs id="g1680" /] of eternal [strongs id="g166" /] life [strongs id="g2222" /].

[This is] a faithful [strongs id="g4103" /] saying [strongs id="g3056" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] these things [strongs id="g4012" /] [strongs id="g5130" /] I will [strongs id="g1014" tvm="PresMidPasDepInd" /] that thou [strongs id="g4571" /] affirm constantly [strongs id="g1226" tvm="PresMidPasDepInf" /], that [strongs id="g2443" /] they which have believed [strongs id="g4100" tvm="PerfActPtc" /] in God [strongs id="g2316" /] might be careful [strongs id="g5431" tvm="PresActSubj" /] to maintain [strongs id="g4291" tvm="PresMidInf" /] good [strongs id="g2570" /] works [strongs id="g2041" /]. These things [strongs id="g5023" /] are [strongs id="g2076" tvm="PresInd" /] good [strongs id="g2570" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] profitable [strongs id="g5624" /] unto men [strongs id="g444" /].

But [strongs id="g1161" /] avoid [strongs id="g4026" tvm="PresMidImpr" /] foolish [strongs id="g3474" /] questions [strongs id="g2214" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] genealogies [strongs id="g1076" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] contentions [strongs id="g2054" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] strivings about [strongs id="g3163" /] the law [strongs id="g3544" /]; for [strongs id="g1063" /] they are [strongs id="g1526" tvm="PresInd" /] unprofitable [strongs id="g512" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] vain [strongs id="g3152" /].

A man [strongs id="g444" /] that is an heretick [strongs id="g141" /] after [strongs id="g3326" /] the first [strongs id="g3391" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] second [strongs id="g1208" /] admonition [strongs id="g3559" /] reject [strongs id="g3868" tvm="PresMidPasDepImpr" /];
